languageSelector.title: Choose Your Language

languageSelector.gdprConsent: By selecting a language, you consent to the processing of your language preference data. Read our {privacyPolicy} and {cookiePolicy} for more information.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: AI Dietitian is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly, including personal details, health information, and dietary preferences.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: Your data is used to provide personalized diet recommendations, improve our services, and communicate with you.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, and port your data.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your data. We may share it with service providers who help us operate our platform.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy inquiries, please contact us through our support channels.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.intro: This policy explains how AI Dietitian uses cookies and similar technologies.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us provide and improve our services.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Required for the website to function properly, including language preference cookies.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

languageCookies.title: Language Selector Cookies
languageCookies.content: When you select a language, we store your preference in a cookie so we can show you the site in your chosen language on future visits.

cookieDuration.title: Cookie Duration
cookieDuration.content: Session cookies expire when you close your browser. Persistent cookies remain for up to 12 months.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies for analytics and functionality.

manageCookies.title: Managing Cookies
manageCookies.content: Most browsers allow you to block, delete, or manage cookies through their settings.

dnt.title: Do Not Track
dnt.content: Our website does not currently respond to Do Not Track signals.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.intro: This page provides detailed information about how we protect and process your personal data.

processingActivities.title: Data Processing Activities
processingActivities.content: We process data for account management, diet recommendations, service improvement, and communication.

securityMeasures.title: Security Measures
securityMeasures.content: We use encryption, access controls, regular audits, and secure infrastructure to protect your data.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.portability: Receive your data in a portable format

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be transferred outside the EU with appropriate safeguards in place.

complaints.title: Filing a Complaint
complaints.content: You have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection supervisory authority.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: You have questions? We have answers.

items.q: How is the AI Dietitian different from a human dietitian?
items.a: The AI Dietitian provides personalized meal plans based on your unique data, offering instant results at a fraction of the cost of traditional dietitians.

items.q: Is my personal data safe with AI Dietitian?
items.a: Yes, we prioritize your privacy and use advanced security measures to protect your data. We do not share your information with third parties without your consent.

items.q: Can I customize my meal plan further after receiving it?
items.a: Absolutely! You can adjust your preferences and regenerate your meal plan anytime to better suit your evolving needs.

items.q: What if I have dietary restrictions or allergies?
items.a: During the onboarding process, you can specify any dietary restrictions or allergies, and the AI will tailor your meal plan accordingly.

items.q: How often should I update my information for the best results?
items.a: We recommend updating your information every few months or whenever there are significant changes in your lifestyle or health goals.

banner.title: Cookie Settings
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can customize your preferences or accept all cookies.
banner.descriptionEU: We value your privacy. Under GDPR, we need your consent to use non-essential cookies. You have full control over your data and can change your preferences at any time.
banner.euNotice: Under GDPR, you have the right to control your data. You can withdraw consent at any time through Cookie Settings in the footer.

modal.title: Cookie Preferences
modal.description: We respect your privacy. Choose which cookies you're comfortable with. You can change these settings at any time.
modal.confirmWithdraw: Are you sure you want to withdraw all cookie consent? This will disable all non-essential cookies and you'll need to provide consent again to use certain features.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled as they're necessary for security, authentication, and basic features.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as language preferences and UI customization.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements tailored to your interests.
